title: Why limited to 2 rune pages?
body:
Why am i only limited to only 2 rune pages? I thought once i reached level 30 id be able to delete the default ones. This makes it complicated. 
How can I get rid or edit those rune pages?

replies.body: New accounts get three pages now.

You get more rune pages with blue essence in the store under accessories.  The preset ones are just extra and don't count towards your total.  They just exist so new players can use the pages when they don't have other ones yet.

You can also buy them with RP, but I wouldn't recommend it.  Rune pages often go on sale as well.

You start with two editable ones and can get more for something like 7000BE, which is nothing by the time you need them.

The others are not editable or removable, they are just decent presets for a majority of champions and examples for new players to use. Between those and two more you can accommodate most champions decently.

Beats me. I owned 20 rune pages before they nerfed runes/masteries to hell.

Now I just redo the same one every game. It's called "rune page." takes about 8-10 seconds to swap around.

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} 

That sounds like user error.. If not, contact support, some sort of bug.
